thread.title: Tank causing delays on busy motorway | Meridian
thread.title_full: Tank causing delays on busy motorway | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Tank causing delays on busy motorway | Meridian
text:
Highways England @HighwaysSEAST Follow #M3 J9-J10. The tank transporter tyre change is complete. @ highwaysseast providing a safe working area. 1 lane closed http://t.co/97n7ykzyt0
12:29 - 2 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite A motorway has been partially blocked by a tank this afternoon.
The tank is on the hard shoulder of the M3 southbound near junction 10.
A transporter carrier the tank suffered a puncture.
The tank had to be placed on the hard shoulder while the repair was carried out.
Last updated Wed 2 Sep 2015 Travel Hampshire & Isle of Wight
